blockNumber.description: number of the block where this transaction was in. `null` when it is pending.

gas.description: The gas limit of this transaction

gasPrice.description: The gas price of this transaction

nonce.description: the number of transactions made by the sender prior to this one

nrg.description: The gas limit of this transaction

nrgPrice.description: The gas price of this transaction

timestamp.description: the unix timestamp for when the transaction was sent, in seconds

transactionIndex.description: the transaction index in current block

to.description: address of the receiver. null when its a contract creation transaction

removed.description: true when the log was removed, due to a chain reorganization. false if its a valid log.

logIndex.description: integer of the log index position in the block. null when its pending log

transactionIndex.description: integer of the transactions index position log was created from. null when its pending log.

transactionHash.description: hash of the transactions this log was created from. null when its pending log.

blockHash.description: hash of the block where this log was in. null when its pending log.

blockNumber.description: the block number where this log was in. null when its pending log.

address.description: address from which this log originated.

topics.description: Array of 0 to 4 32 Bytes DATA of indexed log arguments.
topics.$comment: n solidity: The first topic is the hash of the signature of the event (e.g. Deposit(address,bytes32,uint256)), except you declared the event with the anonymous specifier.

fromBlock.description: (optional, default: "latest") Integer block number, or "latest" for the last mined block or "pending", "earliest" for not yet mined transactions

toBlock.description: (optional, default: "latest") Integer block number, or "latest" for the last mined block or "pending", "earliest" for not yet mined transactions

address.description: (optional) Contract address or a list of addresses from which logs should originate.

topics.description: (optional) Array of 32 Bytes DATA topics. Topics are order-dependent. Each topic can also be an array of DATA with "or" options.

from.description: The address the transaction is sent from.

to.description: The address the transaction is directed from.

gas.description: Integer of the energy provided for the transaction execution.

gasPrice.description: Integer of the gasPrice used for each paid energy

value.description: Integer of the value sent with this transaction

data.description:
Empty for pure balance transfers; otherwise, the encoding of a contract for deployment or a contract method call. Details for encoding depends on VM for that type of transaction: 
[AionVM ABI specification](https://github.com/aionnetwork/AVM/wiki/ABI-Specification)
[FastVM ABI specification](https://github.com/aionnetwork/aion_fastvm/wiki/Specifications#abi-types)
